page.title: 06POPULATION OF SOUTHREPPS
page.content: Population approx. 750: rather less than a century ago, surprising in view of all the new housing. Then cottages were small, families large - one block of 6 cottages housed 30 people, now 3 cottages housing 8. Within living memory farming and associated crafts predominated - less so today. People from other areas have retired here. New familes moving in, working in Norwich or market towns, the gas or oil industry or welfare services. All this helps mould a growing and diverse village, with clubs and activities assisting integration. Most important are local jobs and business compatible with the area. Southrepps has always had diverse small businesses, more now than a decade ago.
